original_text: For we are the aroma of Christ to God among those who are being saved and among those who are perishing,
korean_text: 우리는 구원 받는 자들에게나 망하는 자들에게나 하나님 앞에서 그리스도의 향기니

sentences.original_text: For we are the aroma of Christ to God
among those who are being saved
and among those who are perishing
